text_about_me_1: With almost three years of experience in Angular, I am a front-end developer specialized in creating responsive and attractive websites with fun animations. My knowledge of Scss and best practices ensures the efficiency and easy maintenance of the projects I develop.
text_about_me_2: I am committed to continuous learning and growth in the software development market. Currently, I am expanding my back-end skills with Django and Python and striving to become a full-stack developer to offer more complete and efficient solutions.
